Chrome.Notes:
1. Open devtools > Inside the "Styles" pane, right next to the "+" button, click the Icon "Toggle common rendering emulations".
2. Choose the `prefers-color-scheme` option to emulate the corresponding color scheme.
Chrome.Name: Emulate color schemes

Firefox.Notes: 1. Open devtools > Inspector > Next to the "Filter Styles" section, are the icons to toggle between light, dark color schemes.
Firefox.Name: Emulate color schemes

Safari.Name: Emulate color schemes
Safari.Notes: Open **Web Inspector** using `Cmd+Opt+I`. Look for the icon in the top right of the Elements panel, to toggle between "Force Dark Appearance" and "Use Default Appearance".
